title: Jason’s Weekend In Las Vegas
itunes:title: Jason’s Weekend In Las Vegas
description:
Jason Kelly, Michael Barr and Mike Lynch discuss the biggest stories this week in the Business of Sports. On today’s podcast the trio discuss Jason’s big weekend in Vegas hanging with Dana White and the UFC crew. We learn what it was like being inside T-Mobile arena during the big fight and the electric atmosphere around Ice Cubes Big 3 tipoff. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
